_sText:
A new look at the Zombie Mod. Y can say "Bye!" to boring sitting in indestructible baricade. Let's go hunt! Run for your lives! Run as fast, as you can.


Zm_Toxa_Affraid  - First map. Men with shotguns gona kill zombie.

Zm_Toxa_Arctic   - Little map. Meat factory. :)

Zm_Toxa_Deadlock - Big map. A lot of action and hunt. 

Zm_Toxa_PrisoN_v3- Nice hunt and ballance.

Zm_CONTRA - Innovatiion in Zombie Mod. Realy big map with increadble hunt and race for lives. 

Author is Russian
Автор Русский
